marklogic.body:
I don't think keeping Bobby around as a ghost diminishes anything.Â They had a big emotional send for Dad, showing them Burning his body on screen, and then he popped back up at the end of Season 2 as a spirit when the Devil's Gate was opened and that, imo, was one of the most brilliant, dramatic and touching moments of the entire series, so it didn't diminish a thing.
With Bobby it's even less so because they didn't have the big, emotional send Off.Â They had his final episode and intentionally left the ending up in the air, so they could go anywhere from there.Â
I don't have a problem with that at all, and juding by the reactions I'm seeing here, the amount of people who do seem to be in the greator minority.
